jchess.common

Interface IRuleData

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IRule
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RuleData

    public interface IRuleData
extends IRule
    IRuleData provides interface for the cache module. It expose getters and setters and does not support methods that are linked to logic of the game.
    Since:
    7 Dec 2019
    Author:
    Sajad Karim
